title: Charles River Conducts Risk Management Decision Support Webinar September 30th
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Charles River Development 
BOSTON -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Charles River announces Risk Management for the Front Office with Charles River IMS, a complimentary webinar on Wednesday, September 30, 2015. Charles River experts will discuss the solution’s extensive analytics, visibility and scenario analysis capabilities to improve decision support and manage risk. 
Who: Katya Taycher, Director, Product Management, Charles River 
What: Complimentary webinar: Risk Management for the Front Office with Charles River IMS 
When: September 30, 2015 at 10am US EDT; 15.00 UK BST 
Who should attend: Traders; Portfolio Managers; Investment Executives 
Why: Learn about the latest Charles River IMS capabilities that enable firms to: Integrate Value at Risk – analyze and compare risk across asset classes & portfolios Determine Portfolio Sensitivity – understand factors for interest rates & credit quality Identify Exposure – view across sectors, geographies and counterparties Formulate Ad Hoc market Scenarios – visualize immediate & horizon impact on portfolios 
This webinar is open to Charles River clients and invited guests. Charles River reserves the right to deny access. 
About Charles River 
Charles River provides an end-to-end solution to automate front- and middle-office investment management functions across asset classes on a single platform. Delivered as a hosted service, the solution improves data quality and investment professional productivity, controls risk and lowers technology costs. Charles River serves more than 350 investment firms in over 40 countries in the institutional asset and fund management, private wealth, alternative investments, insurance, banking, and pension markets. For more information visit www.crd.com and follow us on Social Media .
